subject: JUnit issues
msgSnippet: I am running two tests as follows: Problem is: It runs first test but not the second. Assert True is not working (not printing test results/statistics..) Any
messageBody:
I am running two tests as follows: Problem is:
It runs first test but not the second.
Assert True is not working (not printing test results/statistics..)

Any helpful pointers appreciated.
Thanks,
Samy.

public void testFuture() throws Exception {

try {

server.start();
myClass.waitForValue(3001);
String receivedString = (String) myClass.getValue();

Assert.assertTrue(receivedString.equals
(stringToSend));


} catch (Exception e) {

System.out.println("Excepion is:"+e);
}

}

public void testNegative() throws Exception {

try {

server.start();

myClass.waitForValue(1000);

String receivedString = (String)
future.getValue();



} catch (Exception e) {


Assert.assertTrue(true);
}

}
